title: 曠野中唯一的力量
author: 曾祥怡 Grace Tseng
book: 讚美之泉敬拜讚美 (27) – 讚美中信心不斷升起
lyrics_raw:
<1>
[F]你是愛我的天[Am]父
[Dm]絕望中你仍然[Cm7]不停地[F]運[F/A]行
[Bb]你[C/Bb]不願我停[Am]留黑暗[Dm]中
不停[Gm7]追尋我，直到我[Bb/C]得自由
[Region 2]
Father, how You love me
When I’m in despair, I know You are working
You pulled me out of darkest place
And You chased my heart, until You set me free
</1>
<chorus>
你是[F]我[C/E]曠野中  唯[Dm]一的力[F/A]量
[Bb]患難中的[F/A]安慰 黑暗[Gm7]中的盼[C]望
[Bb]我呼求的[C/Bb]日[Bbm/Db]子 [Am]你必[A/C#]拯救[Dm]我
[Gm7]信實的天[Bb/C]父我依靠[F]你
[Region 2]
Oh Father, You’re my strength in the wilderness
Light in the darkness, and a lamp unto my feet
When I cry out to You, You will rescue me
Faithful Father, I will trust in You
</chorus>
<bridge>
阿爸[Dm]父，我是尊貴的[Am]兒女
你教[Bb]我如何[Gm7]用權柄爭[C]戰[A/C#]
阿爸[Dm]父，你用笑臉幫[Am]助我
化[Bb]所有的[Gm]咒詛[G/B]為祝[Bb/C]福[C/D]
[Region 2]
Abba, You call me a child of God
You taught me, how to fight with authority
Abba, You are smiling upon me
No longer cursed, I’m Your blessed child</bridge>

content.origin:
[F]你是愛我的天[Am]父
[Dm]絕望中你仍然[Cm7]不停地[F]運[F/A]行
[Bb]你[C/Bb]不願我停[Am]留黑暗[Dm]中
不停[Gm7]追尋我，直到我[Bb/C]得自由
content.region:
Father, how You love me
When I’m in despair, I know You are working
You pulled me out of darkest place
And You chased my heart, until You set me free
content.origin_text:

絕望中你仍然不停地運行
你不願我停留黑暗中
不停追尋我，直到我得自由

title: 住在祢裡面
author: 曾祥怡 Grace Tseng
lyrics_raw:
<1>
在乾[D]旱無水之[A/C#]地 我渴慕[G/B]祢[D/A]
在曠[G]野無人之[Em]處 我尋求[Asus]祢[A]
得救[G]在乎歸回安[A]息 得力[D]在乎[A/C#]平靜安[Bm]穩
我[G]等候祢 如[A]鷹展翅上[D]騰[D7]
[region 2]
In a dry and weary land, I long for You
In a lone wilderness, I search for You
I will reset in Your salvation
In quietness I trust You
I wait for You to life me on Your wing.
</1>
<chorus>
住在祢[D]裡面[A/C#] 住在祢[Bm]裡面[D/A]
如同[G]枝子與葡萄[A]樹 緊緊相[D]連[D7]
住在祢[D]裡面[A/C#] 住在祢[Bm]裡面[D/A]
領受生[Em]命活水泉[A7]源 永不枯[D]竭
[region 2]
Abiding in You, abiding in You
You are the vine and I'm the branch, I am in You
Abiding in You, abiding in You
Your living water flows in me forevermore
</chorus>

content.origin:
在乾[D]旱無水之[A/C#]地 我渴慕[G/B]祢[D/A]
在曠[G]野無人之[Em]處 我尋求[Asus]祢[A]
得救[G]在乎歸回安[A]息 得力[D]在乎[A/C#]平靜安[Bm]穩
我[G]等候祢 如[A]鷹展翅上[D]騰[D7]
content.region:
In a dry and weary land, I long for You
In a lone wilderness, I search for You
I will reset in Your salvation
In quietness I trust You
I wait for You to life me on Your wing.

得救在乎歸回安息 得力在乎平靜安穩

title: 祂必興旺  我必衰微
author: papachen
book: 2024年北卡台福教會敬拜退休會主題曲
lyrics_raw:
<1>
[G]何等榮耀 [Bm7]何等的恩[C2]典[Cm]
[G]在祢寶座[Bm7]前 洗淨我汙[C2]穢[Cm]
[Em]我呼求[D/F#]祢 [G]謙卑跪下向祢敬[C2]拜
[Em]祢是我[D/F#]磐石 祢是我[Cm/G]拯救　
祢是我[Dsus4]主[D7]
You are my Lord
[region 2]
How glorious, what amazing grace
In front of Your throne, clean my sins away
I call out to You, humbly kneel and worship You
You are my rock, You are my savior
</1>
<2>
[G]何等榮耀[Bm7] 何等的[C2]恩典[Cm]
[G]在祢寶座[Bm7]前 洗淨我[C2]汙穢[Cm]
[Em]高舉雙[D/F#]手 [G]我渴望見祢容[C2]顏
[Em]讓我能看見 [D/F#]讓我能聽見[Cm/G]
聖靈請祢[Am]來 充滿我們中[Dsus4/A]間[D7]
Holy Spirit please come, come and fill this place
[region 2]
How glorious, what amazing grace
In front of Your throne, clean my sins away
I lift my hands, how I long to see your face
Open my eyes Lord, open my ears
</2>
<chorus>
[G]祂必興旺  [D/F#]我必衰微
[Em7]主我願意  [Dm7]降服在祢[G7]面前
[C]不看見自[D]己  只[Bm]求祢心[Em]意
[Am]願萬民[F]悔改歸向[Dsus4]祢[D7]
[G]祂必興旺  [D/F#]我必衰微
[Em7]讓我享受  祢[Dm7]愛的完[G7]全
喔  [C]我一生只[D]求能藏[Bm]在祢裡[E]面
單單[Am]瞻仰祢的[G/B]面 [C]我的喜[D7]樂就完[G]全
[region 2]
He must increase, I must decrease
Lord I submit, myself before You
It's no longer I, but Christ who lives in me
May every nation turn to You
He must increase, I must decrease
Let me rejoice, in Your endless love Lord
All I need Lord, is to hide in Your shadow
Just one glimpse of Your face, all of my joy is fulfilled
</chorus>
<bridge>
[F]我要為祢預備道[G]路
[F]填平一切高山低[G]谷
[Eb]彎曲黑暗的心靈
[Bb]憂傷痛苦的生命
[Cm]凡有氣息的都要
[Am7]經歷救恩  [D7]罪得赦[E7]免
[region 2]
I'll prepare the path for You
Level every valley every hill
Every lost and twisted heart, Lord
Every sad and hopeless life, Lord
Let everything that has breath
See salvation, be forgiven</bridge>
